Package io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.sky

A package containing a system to render skys including parallax.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SkyLayer
    An interface for classes that allow a sky to be rendered.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangingColorLayer
    A sky layer with a changing color.
    ColorLayer
    A layer with a flat color.
    ImageLayer
    A sky layer with a static image.
    ImageMeshLayer
    A sky layer made of a grid of images.
    MoonLayer
    A layer that renders a moon.
    MultiSkyLayer
    Multiple sky layers combined into one.
    ParallaxLayer
    A layer that adds a parallax effect.
    SunLayer
    A sky layer with a sun.
    ThreeImageMesh
    A sky layer mesh made of a top, middle and bottom image.
    TimeParallax
    A sky layer that applies a movement effect based on time.

Package io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.sky Description

A package containing a system to render skys including parallax.
Author:
Tomaso2468
